text: 'david axelrod former top adviser president barack obama told cnn wednesday takes lot work lose donald trump referring former democratic presidential candidate hillary clintons surprising loss race white house fbi director jim comey tell campaign wisconsin convention jim comey say dont put resources michigan final week axelrod said comments came clinton sat tuesday interview partly blamed comeys letter congress came days presidential election reopened fbis investigation clintons use private email server campaigns loss november way winning combination jim comeys letter october russian wikileaks raised doubts minds people inclined vote got scared clinton said axelrod blamed clintons campaign mistakes loss lack attention key states like michigan wisconsin rather outside factors comey letter states went mr trump november first time republican either decades one things hindered campaign sense never fully willing take responsibility mistakes particularly server axelrod said yesterday mr trump tweeted clintons comments comey saying fbi director best thing ever happened hillary clinton recommended face criminal charges server mr trump followed tweet arguing trump russia story excuse used democrats justification losing election fbi director comey best thing ever happened hillary clinton gave free pass many bad deeds phony donald j trump realdonaldtrump may trump russia story excuse used democrats justification losing election perhaps trump ran great campaign donald j trump realdonaldtrump may '
